description: From the Nordic Center in Canmore head west along the cross country ski  trails and enter Banff National Park. Continue on rooty single track to the  Banff Springs golf course - 20km. Follow paved road towards Banff Springs  Hotel. A trail and sign on the left will take you to Goat creek trail which is  double track most of the way up to Whiteman's Gap - 20km. Head down the  gravel road back to the Canmore Nordic Center.
directions: From Canmore downtown follow signs to Canmore Nordic Centre where  there is plenty of parking space.
title: Goat Creek Loop
